name: admin-app

scripts.build:center: taskkill /F /IM "LasVegas Admin Center.exe" 2>nul || echo Process not running && npm run clean:center && cross-env VITE_APP_MODE=center vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.center.cjs
scripts.build:dashboard: taskkill /F /IM "LasVegas Admin Dashboard.exe" 2>nul || echo Process not running && npm run clean:dashboard && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 VITE_APP_MODE=dashboard vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.dashboard.cjs
scripts.electron:dev:center: concurrently -k "npm run dev:center" "wait-on http://localhost:5174 && cross-env VITE_APP_MODE=center electron electron/center.cjs"
scripts.electron:dev:dashboard: concurrently -k "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run worker:zalopay" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env VITE_APP_MODE=dashboard electron electron/dashboard.cjs"
scripts.deploy: git add . && (git commit -m "Auto update" || echo No changes to commit) && npm version patch && git push origin main --follow-tags

description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.
